avalancheActivity.comment: The snowpack is mostly stable. In some places in the High alpine regions, especially on fresh snowdrift accumulations of blown snow, a small, clustered Avalanche can be triggered under higher loads.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The danger of avalanches is low. Be careful in fresh Snowdrift accumulations!

snowpackStructure.comment:
There is little snow, and the peaks and ridges are in some places blown bare. During the last deterioration, about 10 cm of New fallen snow fell, on Sunny slope below 2000 m on terrestrial ground.
In the high alpine regions, weak layers may be present in the old snow cover.
On prominent ones, the snow has already been frozen off and then frozen over, forming a drift.

tendency.highlights:
Friday will be cloudy, with occasional showers.
The weekend will be cloudy and foggy, windy and snowy. The danger of Avalanche will increase!

weatherForecast.comment: Mostly sunny with some clear high clouds. In the afternoon, low clouds will thicken on the coastal side of the Alps and lift towards the Ridge. Above 1500 m it will be around -5 °C with a strong SW wind.
